name: PatronService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Patron Service

scripts.deploy-development: node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/var_development.env -S config/event_sources_dev.json -o arn:aws:iam::<aws generated id>:role/<lambda role> -b subnet-id-on-aws -g sg-security-group-on-aws -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-qa: node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::<aws generated id>:role/<lambda role>' -b subnet-id-on-aws,subnet-id-on-aws -g sg-security-group-on-aws -P nypl-digital-dev
scripts.deploy-production: node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::<aws generated id>:role/<lambda role>' -P nypl-digital-dev
